statements: SELECT user_id, recipe_id, rating FROM user_ratings
SELECT recipe_id, user_id, rating FROM user_ratings
SELECT * FROM user_ratings WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, rating FROM user_ratings WHERE recipe_id = 5
SELECT recipe_id, rating FROM user_ratings ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT user_id, AVG(rating) as avg_rating FROM user_ratings GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(rating) as max_rating FROM user_ratings WHERE rating > 3 GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY max_rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(recipe_id) as total_recipes FROM user_ratings GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_recipes > 5;
SELECT user_id, recipe_id, rating FROM user_ratings WHERE rating IN (4, 5) ORDER BY user_id ASC, rating DESC, recipe_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, recipe_id, SUM(rating) as total_rating FROM user_ratings GROUP BY user_id, recipe_id HAVING total_rating > 10 ORDER BY user_id ASC, recipe_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE difficulty_level = 1
SELECT recipe_name, difficulty_level FROM recipes
SELECT * FROM recipes ORDER BY total_ratings DESC
SELECT recipe_name, total_ratings FROM recipes WHERE difficulty_level > 2
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name FROM recipes WHERE total_ratings >= 100
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE difficulty_level > 2 ORDER BY recipe_name ASC;
SELECT recipe_name, total_ratings FROM recipes JOIN user_ratings ON recipes.recipe_id = user_ratings.recipe_id WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_name, difficulty_level FROM recipes WHERE total_ratings > 100 ORDER BY difficulty_level DESC, recipe_name ASC;
SELECT recipe_name, total_ratings, difficulty_level FROM recipes WHERE recipe_name LIKE 'Spaghetti%' AND total_ratings < 50;
SELECT recipe_name, difficulty_level, total_ratings FROM recipes WHERE difficulty_level BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY total_ratings DESC, recipe_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, rating FROM recipes WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name FROM recipes ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, recipe_id, rating FROM ratings WHERE rating >= 3.0;
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT recipe_name, rating FROM recipes WHERE rating < 3.0 ORDER BY recipe_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT r.recipe_name, u.username, ra.rating FROM recipes r JOIN ratings ra ON r.recipe_id = ra.recipe_id JOIN users u ON ra.user_id = u.user_id WHERE ra.rating >= 4.0 ORDER BY ra.rating DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_recipes FROM recipes;
SELECT * FROM Recipe;
SELECT recipe_name, category FROM Recipe WHERE category = 'Dessert';
SELECT user_name, email FROM User ORDER BY user_name;
SELECT recipe_name, category FROM Recipe WHERE category = 'Breakfast' ORDER BY recipe_name DESC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM User WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, category FROM Recipe ORDER BY category ASC, recipe_name DESC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM User WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, email FROM User WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT recipe_name, category FROM Recipe JOIN Rating ON Recipe.recipe_id = Rating.recipe_id WHERE Rating.rating > 4;
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, category FROM Recipe WHERE category IN ('Italian', 'Mexican') ORDER BY recipe_id ASC;
SELECT recipe_name, chef_name, cook_time_minutes FROM Recipes WHERE difficulty_level = 'Easy';
SELECT recipe_name, difficulty_level FROM Recipes WHERE cook_time_minutes < 30;
SELECT * FROM Ratings WHERE rating > 4.0 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, recommended_recipe_id FROM Recommendations WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, chef_name, cook_time_minutes FROM Recipes WHERE difficulty_level = 'Medium';
SELECT * FROM Ratings ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE registration_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT recipe_name, chef_name, cook_time_minutes FROM Recipes WHERE cook_time_minutes < 60 ORDER BY recipe_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, recommended_recipe_id FROM Recommendations WHERE user_id = 123;
